title: How do I start investing with $100 per month?
text: I'm 23, just started my first job. I can set aside about $100/mo. Should I do a Roth IRA or open a brokerage? What are the first steps and what’s a realistic approach?

title: Student loan repayment changes & best strategy
text: I’m confused by new student loan repayment options (SAVE vs REPAYE). Is there a calculator or .gov page that explains the eligibility and pros/cons?

title: Credit cards for building credit (beginner)
text: What’s a good first credit card to build credit safely? How do I avoid fees and keep utilization low so my credit score improves?

title: Budgeting on a variable income
text: I’m a freelancer with irregular monthly income. How do I build a 50/30/20 budget that handles months with low cash flow?

title: Investing vs paying off high-interest debt first
text: I have $5k in savings, a small emergency fund, and a credit card with 24% APR. Should I prioritize paying off the card before investing?

title: Roth IRA vs Traditional — which one for me?
text: I’m 26 in a 22% tax bracket. Employer 401k match is 3%. Should I max Roth IRA first, get the match, or focus on emergency fund?

title: Is this crypto 'guaranteed 5x' opportunity legit?
text: Friend says there’s a guaranteed 5x coin. Claims it’s risk-free and a secret insider tip. Sounds too good to be true but I’m tempted.

title: Best high-yield savings account right now
text: Where do I park my emergency fund? Are there .gov resources or reputable comparisons for APY, fees, and insurance (FDIC/NCUA)?

title: How to start a simple emergency fund
text: What’s a step-by-step plan for a $1,000 emergency fund when my rent and groceries already take most of my paycheck? Any tips to automate?

title: Beginner ETF picks for long-term investing
text: Looking for simple, low-fee ETFs to start with. What’s an expense ratio to aim for, and how often should I rebalance?
